This is honestly a great game to play with friends'n and just some coop matches.

But if you are going to play comp games, YOU, GOTTA, HAVE, PRIME. There are a lot of hackers in the free version of the game in my experience.  But other then that its fine, people in prime usually dosen't hack. i think.

Your reflexes must be perfect, it needs high attention!
This game makes a real addiction... The only one game i play.
if u dont play, its really a good game.

This game is amazing, but the community in the lower ranks are toxic and immature, very hard to advance without a full team of reliable teammates. I recommend to play on with friends, have prime accounts, and maintain a good trust factor in the game.
Its a fun game but if you get angry easy you should not buy this game
